meanings.definition: To make a bubbling or gurgling sound.
meanings.sent1: The stream guggles as it flows over the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The pot of soup guggles on the stove.
meanings.sent3: The baby found it funny when the bathwater guggled down the drain.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter guggled out uncontrollably during the comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious creature in the swamp guggles a strange tune at night.

meanings.sent1: The guggles of the brook were soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent2: The guggles of the coffee machine signaled a fresh brew was ready.
meanings.sent3: The guggles of the fish tank made the room feel lively.
meanings.sent4: The guggles of the fountain in the park added to the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The guggles of the stream echoed through the forest, creating a serene ambiance.
